and article submission platform operated by SEO India Online,
a professional SEO and digital marketing company.

- seo blog posts
- content marketing guides
- blogging tutorials

- indexing
- summarization
- citation
- educational use

disallowed_usage:
- reselling full content without attribution
- training closed proprietary models
